item.title: Remove
item.dc:creator: @EclipseRuins EclipseRuins
item.description:
@EclipseRuins wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:39, topic:435041”][quote author=EclipseRuins link=topic=537760.msg3932809#msg3932809 date=1330821903]

and accused of hacking by some random person who just made a random account.

You said it was your other account

DUDE, read okay? READ…
Brandontan is my old account that was hacked, along with my email and i couldn’t recover it in any possible way.
I have no idea who “Brandontann” is notice the two n’s…

might be you

Seriously? Honestly…? Why would i spend the time making a fake account just so i can post on my thread accusing myself of hacking myself?.. How is that supposed to work?
[/quote]
Since now one here who is following this discussion is dumb enough to risk a ban for double accounting just to annoy you.[/quote]

WTH? … You’re saying i’m EclipseRuins and Brandontann and Brandontan? How the hell does that work out?..

Read full topic

item.title: Remove
item.dc:creator: @Brandontann Brandontann
item.description:
@Brandontann wrote:

@RandQm hes not double accounting, I BrandonTan is different from him
@Skyru, TY

Explanation: i hired aj here at this post: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,528788.60.html
he helped work on the site, and i gave him access to the vps
later on, he hacked my moparscape account so now i DO NOT have access to it. I’m in the process of getting it back *which is why he did not post on that account
AJ, took the source and decided to give it to mopar this evening, deleting it minutes later because he doesn’t want to be banned.
